MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Stoke On Trent , affecting properties in Talke Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08.44am. Our engineers have arrived on site in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09.33am on 14th April 2021.
